quoteText:
When you use the Services, we automatically collect information, including personal information, about the services you use and how you use them.
This information is necessary for the adequate performance of the contract between you and us, to enable us to comply with legal obligations and given our legitimate interest in being able to provide and improve the functionalities of the Services.<ul>
title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

tosdr.case: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes
